definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: bitterness;—only pl. intens. [[תַּמְרוּרִים]] Ho 12:15 + 2 t.;—´[[מִסְפַּד ת]] Je 6:26 mourning of bitterness (bitter mourning), so ´[[בְּכִי ת]] Je 31:15 (cf. the vb. Is 22:4, Zec 12:10); as adv. bitterly Ho 12:15 (si vera l.).—II. [[[תַּמְרוּר]] ] v. sub [[ת]].
